SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an administrator in the hospital system.
AdminController
A controller class that provides various administrative actions for managing staff, appointments, inventory, and admin-related operations.
AdminRepository
Repository class for managing Admin entities.
AdminView
The AdminView class provides a user interface for administrators to manage hospital operations such as staff, appointments, and inventory, as well as approve replenishment requests.
Appointment
Represents an Appointment entity in the system, containing details about the patient, doctor, date, and status.
AppointmentController
Controller for managing Appointment-related operations.
AppointmentOutcome
Represents the outcome of an appointment, including details such as services provided, medication prescribed, and consultation notes.
AppointmentOutcomeController
Controller for managing AppointmentOutcome entities, providing utility methods for retrieving, creating, and filtering appointment outcomes.
AppointmentOutcomeRepository
Repository for managing AppointmentOutcome entities, providing functionality to load, store, and retrieve appointment outcomes from a CSV file.
AppointmentRepository
Manages the storage and retrieval of Appointment entities.
Doctor
Represents a Doctor entity with basic personal and professional details.
DoctorController
DoctorController class provides operations for managing doctor-related functionality.
DoctorRepository
Repository class for managing Doctor entities.
DoctorView
DoctorView class provides the user interface and menu for doctor operations.
IEntity
The IEntity interface defines the contract for entity objects, specifying methods for obtaining an entity's unique identifier, converting the entity to and from CSV format, and representing it as a string.
Inventory
Represents an inventory item in the medical inventory system.
InventoryController
The InventoryController class provides static methods for managing inventory data.
InventoryRepository
The InventoryRepository class provides methods to manage inventory items, including CRUD operations, low stock checks, and restock requests.
Leave
Represents a leave entity for hospital staff.
LeavesController
Controller class for managing leave-related operations.
LeavesRepository
Repository class for managing leave data.
Main
Main class for the hospital management system.
MedicalRecord
Represents a medical record in the healthcare system.
MedicalRecordController
Controller class for managing `MedicalRecord` entities.
MedicalRecordRepository
Repository class for managing `MedicalRecord` entities.
PasswordUtils
Utility class for password hashing using the SHA-256 algorithm.
Patient
Represents a Patient entity in the system, encapsulating personal details and medical information.
PatientController
Controller class for managing `Patient` entities and their interactions.
PatientRepository
Repository class for managing Patient entities.
PatientView
Class for managing the patient interface and user interactions.
Pharmacist
Represents a Pharmacist entity in the system.
PharmacistController
Controller class for managing actions related to Pharmacist.
PharmacistRepository
Repository class for managing Pharmacist entities.
PharmacistView
The PharmacistView class provides a user interface for pharmacists to interact with the system.
Prescription
The Prescription class represents a medical prescription in the system.
PrescriptionController
The PrescriptionController class provides static methods to manage prescriptions, including creating, updating, dispensing, and retrieving prescription details.
PrescriptionRepository
The PrescriptionRepository class is responsible for managing prescription data.
Repository<T>
Abstract base class for managing entities stored in a CSV file.
RepositoryGetter
Utility class for retrieving singleton instances of various repositories.
SafeScanner
Utility class for safe and validated input handling from the console.
Staff
The Staff class represents a staff member in the system.
StaffController
Controller class for managing actions related to Staff.
StaffRepository
Repository class for managing Staff entities.
TimeRangeMerger
Utility class for merging a list of time slots into contiguous time ranges.
User
Represents a User entity within the system.
UserController
Controller for managing user-related operations.
UserRepository
Repository for managing User entities.
UserRole
